fixes.name: Profit Margin %
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted row-level multiplication from Tableau ([Profit Ratio ]*100) to DAX, preserving row context and using table-qualified column reference.

fixes.name: Profit vs Target (Uses Profit Margin %)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted row-level subtraction from Tableau ([Profit Margin %]-15) to DAX, referencing the previously defined calculated column with table-qualified syntax.

fixes.name: Target Status
fixes.dax_expression: IF('Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit vs Target (Uses Profit Margin %)] > 0, "Above Target ", "Below Target")
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF expression to DAX IF, using the calculated field 'Profit vs Target (Uses Profit Margin %)' with table-qualified reference and preserving the original string outputs.
